description: Manage dedicated hsm with hardware security modules.

commands.name: az dedicated-hsm create
commands.summary: Create a dedicated HSM in the specified subscription.
commands.syntax:
az dedicated-hsm create --name
                        --resource-group
                        [--location]
                        [--mgmt-network-interfaces]
                        [--mgmt-network-subnet]
                        [--network-interfaces]
                        [--no-wait]
                        [--sku {SafeNet Luna Network HSM A790, payShield10K_LMK1_CPS250, payShield10K_LMK1_CPS2500, payShield10K_LMK1_CPS60, payShield10K_LMK2_CPS250, payShield10K_LMK2_CPS2500, payShield10K_LMK2_CPS60}]
                        [--stamp-id]
                        [--subnet]
                        [--tags]
                        [--zones]
examples: az dedicated-hsm create --name "hsm1" --location "westus" --network-interfaces private-ip-address="1.0.0.1" --subnet id="/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/hsm-group/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/stamp01/subnets/stamp01" --stamp-id "stamp01" --sku "SafeNet Luna Network HSM A790" --tags Dept="hsm" Environment="dogfood" --resource-group "hsm-group"

az dedicated-hsm create --name "hsm1" --location "westus" --mgmt-network-interfaces private-ip-address="1.0.0.1" --mgmt-network-subnet id="/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/hsm-group/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/stamp01/subnets/stamp01" --stamp-id "stamp01" --sku "payShield10K_LMK1_CPS60" --tags Dept="hsm" Environment="dogfood" --resource-group "hsm-group"

az dedicated-hsm create --name "hsm1" --location "westus" --network-interfaces private-ip-address="1.0.0.2" --subnet id="/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/hsm-group/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/stamp01/subnets/stamp01" --mgmt-network-interfaces private-ip-address="1.0.0.1" --mgmt-network-subnet id="/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/hsm-group/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/stamp01/subnets/stamp01" --stamp-id "stamp02" --sku "payShield10K_LMK1_CPS60" --tags Dept="hsm" Environment="dogfood" --resource-group "hsm-group"

commands.name: az dedicated-hsm delete
commands.summary: Deletes the specified Azure Dedicated HSM.

commands.name: az dedicated-hsm list
commands.summary: The List operation gets information about the dedicated hsms associated with the subscription and within the specified resource group. And The List operation gets information about the dedicated HSMs associated with the subscription.

commands.name: az dedicated-hsm list-outbound-network-dependency-endpoint
commands.summary: Gets a list of egress endpoints (network endpoints of all outbound dependencies) in the specified dedicated hsm resource. The operation returns properties of each egress endpoint.

commands.name: az dedicated-hsm show
commands.summary: Gets the specified Azure dedicated HSM.

commands.name: az dedicated-hsm update
commands.summary: Update a dedicated HSM in the specified subscription.
examples: az dedicated-hsm update --name "hsm1" --tags Dept="hsm" Environment="dogfood" Slice="A" --resource-group "hsm-group"
az dedicated-hsm update --name "hsm1" --tags Dept="hsm" Environment="dogfood" Slice="A" --resource-group "hsm-group"

commands.name: az dedicated-hsm wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition of the dedicated-hsm is met.
